summary: An affluent, middle-aged couple's uneventful lives are forever changed when they move into an isolated house in the country and befriend an odd, younger couple.
cast: Sabine Azéma|Daniel Auteuil|Amira Casar|Sergi López|Hélène de Saint-Père|Philippe Katerine|Sabine Haudepin|Roger Miremont|Jacques Nolot|Marie-Pierre Chaix|Florence Loiret Caille|Thiago Telès|Philippe Suner|Cécile Reigher|Henri Behar-Thinières|Hervé Duhamel|Jean-François Labourle|Emily Roussos|Pascal Tréguy
title: Pintar o hacer el amor
